content: 2x 10 8-10 10 single_crochet finish off leaving a long tail for sewing to body stuff firmly now we will attach the body to head and then the arms to body in the appropriate places of course now for the hat and belt to prepare our little link for action hat chain 30 join with a slip_stitch to first chain forming a ring try this on for size it should fit a bit snugly crochet 8 rounds of 30 single_crochet each round 9 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet* repeat from * 5x more 24 10 & 11 24 single_crochet 24 12 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet* repeat from * 5x more 18 13 & 14 18 single_crochet 18 15 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet* repeat from * 5x more 12 16-18 12 single_crochet 12 19 single_crochet decrease 6x 6 20 &21 6sc v 1 2 updated july 31 2011 www woollybytes com ©2007-2011 roxanne wood 22 single_crochet decrease 3x 3 finish off and close up the tip of the hat if necessary belt chain 30 join at the back sort of off center don t worry about the tail from the beginning we will conceal this away after joining do not sever the yarn continue working a chain up and across the opposite shoulder securing this chain to the front with a slip_stitch finish off leaving a long tail this tail can be used to lightly tack the belt in place and then be made to disappear within the body of the amigurumi embroider the hair and eyes with the hat on to ensure satisfactory placement when facial features are complete lightly tack the hat in place and tack the underside of the tip of the hat in place to keep it from looking like a gnome hat weave in any missed ends and your link is ready to quest for the triforce v 1 2 updated july 31 2011 www woollybytes com ©2007-2011 roxanne wood
